Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: The teacher was able to be more specific and directly provide me relevant feedback therefore I was able to learn better.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Getting feedback from GenAI was not as personal as I knew that the technology may have not specifically understood.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Using GenAI was more efficient and I was able to get instant feedback and assistance.
